title: Vroom Vroom
lyrics:
Maeil maeil gat-eun halu kkeut-e
Ileohda hal byeonham-eobsneun ilsang tas-e
Iltalhago sip-eun nainga bwa
Ani geuleon nal-inga bwa ah yeah
Eojewa daleul ge eobsdeon gil-i
Yeonghwa-eseona bodeon geogi mwoji

Paris syangjellije geoli

Geulae geogi gat-ae (eo?)



Oneul bam-eun Friday night

Modeun ge jayuloun bam-iya

Yeon-indeul sailo

Nun-e ttuin neoleul hyanghae dallyeo



I sigan-i jinamyeon

God ijhyeojige doel tende

Jamdeulji moshaneun bam

Neoneun deo nunbusijanh-a

Daleun geon amu pil-yo eobs-eo

Oh na-ege mam-eul yeol-eo



Geolie naelin bamhaneul byeolbich

Geu sog-e gajang bichnaneun bulbich

Nae mam-eun u! Vroom Vroom Vroom

Neoege u! Vroom Vroom Vroom

Chulbal-eul allin wonsaeg-ui bulbich

Ppalgahge beonjin jiljuui nunbich

Nae mam-eun u! Vroom Vroom Vroom

Neoege u! Vroom Vroom Vroom



Maeil maeil gat-eun salamdeul-e

Uimi eobsneun daehwadeulman ogo gal ttae

Nungwa gwiwa mam-eun ttalo nol-a

Oneul gat-eun nal-eun geulae (gwaenhi geulae)

Hwalyeohan ne-onsain-eulo kkwag chan

Aleumdaun salamdeullo gadeugchan i bam

Jageug-i jom pil-yohan bam

Baby Iâ€™m so fly



Neoleul dalm-eun Friday night

Modeun ge jayuloun bam-iya

Sigan teum sailo

Neol jjoch-a issneun himkkeos dallyeo



Oneul nan neowalamyeon

Eodideun sang-gwan-eobs-euni

Gakkai neoleul naui

Gyeot-e dul suman issdamyeon

Daleun geon amu pil-yo eobs-eo

Oh na-ege mam-eul yeol-eo



Geolie naelin bamhaneul byeolbich

Geu sog-e gajang bichnaneun bulbich

Nae mam-eun u! Vroom Vroom Vroom

Neoege u! Vroom Vroom Vroom

Chulbal-eul allin wonsaeg-ui bulbich

Ppalgahge beonjin jiljuui nunbich

Nae mam-eun u! Vroom Vroom Vroom

Neoege u! Vroom Vroom Vroom



Oh sweet

Nawa Vroom Vroom

Oh sweet

Neowa naega Vroom Vroom

Oh i bam Vroom Vroom Vroom

Ulin Vroom Vroom
